QuestData.Title: The Spear of Kalliope
QuestData.Description:
The Spear of Kalliope is finally in my grasp!
With it, I will lay waste to all the Forsworn's enemies. Now behold while I take my prize!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Prove your worth. Defeat her and earn the Spear of Kalliope.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Artificer Ligiea and earn the Spear of Kalliope.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Haetio outside the Third Chamber of Kalliope.
